reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic batteries... they make your ___________ go vrrrooooommmm! :D
reviews.reviewText: Update: So... apparently the batteries work fine but the sensor they were used to power is faulty. My previous review was wrong! It WAS a faulty sensor, not the batteries! Batteries are wonderful, work as they are supposed to, outstanding price, etc. :) So, as previously stated, I'm back to right a wrong, change the rating, hang my head in shame, and admit my error in the last review. There ya have it. Batteries are fantastic. Buy them! :)Previous Review:These have not lasted. I purchased a package of 10 at the end of Sept. A bit over 2 months later, I have 5 left. 3 or 4 have lasted less than 24hrs, the other one or two lasted a week at best. I know this because the device I use them in sends me a notification when it loses connection... I don't think it's a device malfunction. As soon as I replace the battery, it reconnects. I suppose it could be the device but I'm thinking not. So, I'll get some different batteries and if I have the same result, I will promptly show up here again and update my review. If not... this one will stand. Just haven't had much power luck with these and thought you should be aware before buying. The shipping was fast though. :P

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expired Product? Lasted only Few Weeks.
reviews.reviewText: The battery seems well packaging. Maybe the expired or outdated being sent to me as I don't see a date on the package or battery. It showed about 3/4 of battery when 1st inserted in the gadget and it only last for few weeks? I have tried 3 batteries so far.Updated 4-13-22: They are great seller as they apologize for the faulty battery and offer a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cost effective replacements for ecobee smart thermostat
reviews.reviewText: These are cost effective replacements for ecobee smart thermostat. Time will tell how their longevity compares with the OEM batteries, but I suspect they will be fine as I replace them yearly before they fail.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'm still making up my mind but they seem ok
reviews.reviewText: I'll be the bigger man and admit that these batteries are a little unusual in that they're pretty symmetrical and without glasses it's not immediately obvious which side is + since the notched side is usually - as the 'cap' is +, but these sort of have a dip so that you have a 50/50 chance of inverting it if you're not really paying attention, but then why wouldn't you pay attention and wear your glasses?In any case, I'm still trying these out and with 10 batteries it'll take me a bit to figure out how well they last, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Random checking shows min 3.8V
reviews.reviewText: I won't know how good these are until they last at least 24 months, like the factory original

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Bluetooth LE Thermon Sensors
reviews.reviewText: Used in Bluetooth LE Temperature & Humidity Sensors. The sensors provide data on a 1 minute interval. The batteries last around 4 to 5 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the materials they were made from
reviews.reviewText: These are worthless. I have had three of these batteries die in about two months. Guess what… two of my sensors have their original batteries from two years ago and are still working fine. You might suggest that those sensors aren’t being used as much. However, these batteries are being used in temperature/motion sensors not door sensors. One with an original battery is in my Master Bedroom, so it still is detecting us all night every night. Also, the original batteries for the two sensors these batteries are in lasted almost two years. Two of the new batteries started saying they were low within a day of inserting them, the third barely lasted two months. I can deal with one out of ten batteries failing, that is just bad luck. I CANNOT deal with three out of the three batteries I used failing.Do not waste your money!
